dashboard.inspection_desc: Chaque véhicule subit une inspection rigoureuse sur plus de 100 points de contrôle pour garantir son parfait état mécanique et esthétique.
dashboard.admin_desc: Nous nous occupons de toutes les démarches : négociation, contrat de vente, désimmatriculation allemande et documents d'exportation.
dashboard.transport_desc: Transport par camion porte-voiture assuré tous risques jusqu'à votre domicile ou notre centre de livraison le plus proche.
dashboard.warranty_desc: Tous nos véhicules sont livrés avec une garantie mécanique européenne de 12 mois minimum, extensible jusqu'à 36 mois.
dashboard.registration_desc: Nous vous fournissons tous les documents nécessaires (COC, Quitus Fiscal, CPI) pour l'immatriculation définitive dans votre pays.
dashboard.step1_desc: Validation des critères et estimation du coût total.
dashboard.step2_desc: Vérification sur place et sécurisation du véhicule.
dashboard.step3_desc: Rapatriement sécurisé vers le pays de destination.
dashboard.step4_desc: Remise des clés et des papiers à votre domicile.

vehicles.no_results_desc: Try changing your search criteria or reset filters.

vehicles.extended_warranty_desc: Prolongez votre tranquillité d'esprit avec notre garantie étendue 24 mois

vehicle_detail.thermal_vehicle: Thermal vehicle - No battery diagnostic required
vehicle_detail.maintenance_history: Complete maintenance history available • All revisions made in authorized dealership
vehicle_detail.extended_warranty_desc: Extend your peace of mind with our 24-month extended warranty

services_page.title: Our Services
services_page.subtitle: A turnkey solution to import your vehicle with peace of mind. We manage the entire process from A to Z.
services_page.search_desc: We find the exact vehicle you are looking for among thousands of listings in Germany, checking availability and compliance.
services_page.inspection_desc: Each vehicle undergoes a rigorous inspection on more than 100 control points to ensure its perfect mechanical and aesthetic condition.
services_page.admin_desc: We take care of all procedures: negotiation, sales contract, German deregistration, and export documents.
services_page.transport_desc: Transport by car carrier truck fully insured to your home or our nearest delivery center.
services_page.warranty_desc: All our vehicles are delivered with a European mechanical warranty of at least 12 months, extendable up to 36 months.
services_page.registration_desc: We provide you with all the necessary documents (COC, Tax Clearance, CPI) for final registration in your country.
services_page.step1_desc: Validation of criteria and total cost estimation.
services_page.step3_desc: Secure repatriation to the destination country.
services_page.step4_desc: Handover of keys and papers at your home.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Have a question about a vehicle or want a personalized quote? Our team is here to help.
contact.chat_desc: Chat instantly with a sales advisor via WhatsApp.
contact.success_message: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.

about_page.hero_subtitle: Your trusted partner for importing premium used vehicles from Germany

history.title: Our Story
history.p1: Founded in 2009, AUTO17 was born from a passion for automobiles and a clear vision: to make premium German used vehicles accessible to everyone.
history.p2: Based in Berlin, at the heart of the German automotive market, we have developed a strong network of partners and experts to offer you the best vehicles at the best price.
history.p3: Today, we are proud to have helped over 10,000 customers across Europe find their dream vehicle, with personalized service and a quality guarantee.
history.p4: Our commitment remains the same: transparency, quality, and customer satisfaction above all.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide our daily work
values.transparency_desc: We believe in honest and transparent communication. All our prices are clear, with no hidden fees.
values.passion_desc: Our passion for automobiles drives us to select only the best vehicles for our customers.
values.quality_desc: Each vehicle undergoes rigorous quality control and complete technical expertise.
values.excellence_desc: We aim for excellence in every aspect of our service, from selection to delivery.

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: Passionate experts at your service
team.member1_desc: 15 years of experience in automotive import
team.member3_desc: Certified mechanic with 20 years of experience

cta.title: Ready to Find Your Ideal Vehicle?
cta.subtitle: Discover our selection of premium vehicles or contact us for personalized support

how_to_buy.hero_subtitle: Your step-by-step guide to acquiring your vehicle with ease

step1.title: Personalized Search
step1.desc: Define your criteria and let us find the rare gem.

step2.title: Contact & Advice
step2.desc: Talk to our experts to refine your choice.

step3.title: Inspection & Validation
step3.desc: We rigorously check the vehicle for you.

step5.title: Administrative Procedures
step5.desc: We handle all the paperwork for you.

step6.title: Home Delivery
step6.desc: Receive your vehicle at home, ready to drive.

financing.title: Financing
financing.desc: Credit solutions adapted to your budget

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does the process take?
faq.a1: On average, allow 2 to 3 weeks between order and delivery.
faq.a2: The displayed price generally includes import fees, but home delivery may be optional depending on your location.
faq.a3: Yes, you have a withdrawal period in accordance with current legislation.

auctions.hero_subtitle: Buy premium vehicles at advantageous prices through professional auctions

intro.title: What is a Car Auction?
intro.desc: Professional car auctions are B2B platforms where dealers, leasing companies, and businesses sell their vehicles. Thanks to our expertise and privileged access, we allow you to benefit from these advantageous prices normally reserved for professionals.
intro.important_desc: Auctions are reserved for professionals. As an individual, you cannot access them directly. That's why we participate in auctions on your behalf and guarantee you the best service.

advantages.title: Why Buy at Auctions?
advantages.subtitle: Incomparable advantages
advantages.price_desc: Buy premium vehicles up to 30% cheaper than the traditional market thanks to professional auctions.
advantages.verified_desc: All vehicles at auctions are inspected and certified by independent experts.
advantages.selection_desc: Access to thousands of premium vehicles from corporate fleets, leasing, and trade-ins.
advantages.transparency_desc: Complete history, detailed photos, and inspection report available for each vehicle.

how_it_works.title: How It Works?
how_it_works.subtitle: The process in 5 simple steps
how_it_works.step1_desc: We monitor professional auctions in Germany daily and select the best opportunities according to your criteria.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Our team of experts analyzes the history, condition, and market value of each vehicle before participating in auctions.
how_it_works.step3_desc: We participate in auctions on your behalf with an optimized buying strategy to get the best price.
how_it_works.step4_desc: Once the vehicle is won, we perform a complete inspection and prepare all necessary documents.
how_it_works.step5_desc: The vehicle is prepared, cleaned, and delivered to the address of your choice with all documents and warranty included.

types.title: Types of Vehicles at Auctions
types.subtitle: Where do the vehicles come from?
types.fleet_desc: Well-maintained company cars with complete history
types.leasing_desc: Recent vehicles in excellent condition with low mileage
types.trade_in_desc: Premium vehicles traded in at official dealerships

tips.title: Our Tips
tips.subtitle: To maximize your chances of finding the rare gem
tips.budget_desc: Set a maximum budget including the purchase price, fees, and delivery.
tips.flexible_desc: The more flexible your criteria (color, options), the more opportunities you will have.
tips.experts_desc: Our team knows the market and will advise you on the best opportunities.
tips.act_fast_desc: The best deals go fast. Be reactive when we propose a vehicle to you.

cta.title: Interested in Auctions?
cta.subtitle: Contact us to discuss your criteria and we will find the ideal vehicle for you

hero.title: Import your used vehicle
hero.subtitle: from Germany
hero.description: German quality, competitive prices and secure delivery throughout Europe.

why_us.title: Why choose MonGarage?
why_us.description: We simplify the import of used vehicles by offering you a complete, secure and transparent service.
why_us.certified_desc: Rigorous inspection and complete verified history for each vehicle.
why_us.transparent_desc: No hidden fees. Final price including transport and administrative procedures.
why_us.delivery_desc: Secure delivery to your home in 8 European countries.
why_us.warranty_desc: European mechanical warranty for worry-free driving.

featured.title: Featured Vehicles
featured.description: Discover our selection of the best opportunities of the moment.

how_it_works.title: How does it work?
how_it_works.description: Your new car in 4 simple steps.
how_it_works.step1_desc: Select your vehicle from our large certified catalog.
how_it_works.step2_desc: Confirm your order and sign the secure sales contract.
how_it_works.step3_desc: Make payment by secure bank transfer.
how_it_works.step4_desc: Receive your vehicle at home, ready to drive.

europe_delivery.title: Delivery throughout Europe
europe_delivery.description: We ensure the transport of your vehicle from Germany to 8 European countries. Our service includes all administrative and customs procedures.

cta.title: Ready to find your dream car?
cta.description: Don't waste any more time. Trust us with your search and benefit from our expertise to import your vehicle safely.

footer.tagline: Your trusted partner for importing used vehicles from Germany to all of Europe.
footer.inspection_desc: Each vehicle undergoes a rigorous inspection on more than 100 control points to guarantee its perfect mechanical and aesthetic condition.
footer.admin_desc: We take care of all the procedures: negotiation, sales contract, German deregistration and export documents.
footer.transport_desc: Transport by car carrier truck insured all risks to your home or our nearest delivery center.
footer.warranty_desc: All our vehicles are delivered with a European mechanical warranty of 12 months minimum, extendable up to 36 months.
footer.registration_desc: We provide you with all the necessary documents (COC, Tax Clearance, CPI) for final registration in your country.
footer.step1_desc: Validation of criteria and estimation of total cost.
footer.step2_desc: On-site verification and securing of the vehicle.
footer.step3_desc: Secure repatriation to the destination country.
footer.step4_desc: Handover of keys and papers at your home.

sourcing.hero_subtitle: Premium vehicles carefully selected in Germany and Europe

intro.title: Why Germany?
intro.desc: Germany is the cradle of premium automobiles and has the most developed and reliable used vehicle market in Europe. Quality standards are exceptional, and vehicle maintenance is mandatory and rigorously controlled.
intro.stat2: Of our vehicles come from Germany

sources.title: Where Do Our Vehicles Come From?
sources.subtitle: Three main sources for optimal quality
sources.fleet_desc: Vehicles from large companies with regular maintenance and complete history.
sources.leasing_desc: Vehicles at the end of professional leasing contracts, often in excellent condition.
sources.trade_in_desc: Vehicles traded in at official dealerships when purchasing a new vehicle.

countries.title: Our Source Countries
countries.subtitle: A rigorous selection across Europe
countries.germany_desc: Our main market with the best premium vehicles
countries.germany_reason4: Most developed auto market in Europe

quality.title: Our Quality Guarantee
quality.subtitle: A rigorous selection process
quality.control_desc: Each vehicle goes through a 150-point check before being offered for sale.
quality.history_desc: We check the complete history: accidents, maintenance, previous owners.
quality.certification_desc: All our vehicles are certified compliant with European standards.
quality.transparency_desc: Detailed inspection report and HD photos available for each vehicle.

process.title: Our Selection Process
process.step1_desc: We monitor the best sources in Germany and Europe daily.
process.step2_desc: Check of complete history, documents, and provenance.
process.step3_desc: 150-point technical inspection by our certified experts.
process.step4_desc: Final validation and certification before sale.

cta.title: Discover Our Selection
cta.subtitle: Premium vehicles carefully selected for you

warranties.hero_subtitle: Drive with peace of mind with our comprehensive warranties and 24/7 assistance
warranties.coverage_subtitle: Complete protection for your peace of mind
warranties.cta_subtitle: Our team is at your disposal to advise you

coverage.engine_desc: Complete coverage of powertrain, gearbox, and clutch
coverage.electric_desc: Onboard electronics, battery, alternator, and starter
coverage.suspension_desc: Shock absorbers, springs, power steering, and ball joints
coverage.brakes_desc: Brakes, ABS, ESP, and all safety components

advantages.immediate_desc: Your warranty is active as soon as the vehicle is delivered
advantages.support_desc: A team available day and night to assist you
advantages.network_desc: More than 5,000 approved garages across Europe

faq.q1: Can I extend my warranty after purchase?
faq.a1: Yes, you can subscribe to an extended warranty within 30 days of purchasing the vehicle.
faq.q2: Is the warranty valid throughout Europe?
faq.a2: Yes, our warranties are valid in all European countries with our network of approved garages.
faq.q3: What to do in case of breakdown?
faq.a3: Contact our 24/7 assistance at the number indicated on your warranty certificate. We will organize towing and repair.
faq.q4: Is there a deductible to pay?
faq.a4: The standard warranty may include a deductible. Extended and premium warranties have no deductible.

expertises.hero_subtitle: A rigorous 150-point check for your peace of mind
expertises.intro_desc: Each vehicle we offer undergoes a complete expertise carried out by our certified technicians. This 150-point inspection ensures that you receive a vehicle in perfect condition, with no unpleasant surprises.
expertises.points_subtitle: A complete inspection of all systems

process.step1_desc: Detailed examination of the vehicle exterior and interior
process.step2_desc: Test of all mechanical and electronic systems
process.step4_desc: Generation of a detailed report with photos

certifications.certified_desc: Our inspectors are certified and have over 15 years of automotive experience.
certifications.independent_desc: Our expertises are carried out completely independently and objectively.
certifications.report_desc: Each vehicle has a complete inspection report available on request.

checks.accidents_desc: Complete history check and search for repair traces
checks.mileage_desc: Validation of actual mileage via history and databases
checks.mechanical_desc: Complete test of all mechanical and electronic systems
checks.legal_desc: Verification of compliance with European standards and documents

warning.title: Our Transparency Commitment
warning.desc1: If during our expertise we detect a major problem or a hidden defect, we refuse the vehicle. We only offer vehicles that successfully pass our rigorous quality control.
warning.desc2: Your satisfaction and safety are our top priority.

expertises.cta_subtitle: Discover our selection of vehicles that have successfully passed our complete expertise

hero.title: Visit a Vehicle
hero.subtitle: Several options to discover your future vehicle in detail

visit.options_subtitle: Three ways to discover our vehicles

virtual.title: 360° Virtual Tour
virtual.description: Explore the vehicle in detail from home

video.title: Video Conference Visit
video.description: An expert presents the vehicle to you live

physical.title: Physical Visit
physical.description: Come see and test drive the vehicle on site

visit.how_it_works_subtitle: 4 simple steps to visit your vehicle

1.title: Choose Your Vehicle
1.description: Browse our catalog and select the vehicle you are interested in

2.title: Book Your Visit
2.description: Choose the type of visit and make an appointment online or by phone

3.title: Prepare Your Questions
3.description: Note all the points you want to check or questions to ask

4.title: Visit the Vehicle
4.description: Enjoy your virtual, video, or physical visit according to your choice

cta.title: Ready to Visit Your Future Vehicle?
cta.subtitle: Contact us to plan your virtual, video, or physical visit

faq.q: Is the virtual tour as detailed as a physical visit?
faq.a: Yes! Our 360° virtual tours include HD photos from all angles, zooms on details, and a complete presentation video.

faq.q: Can I take a test drive?
faq.a: Yes, during a physical visit to our premises, you can take a test drive by appointment.

faq.q: How long does a video conference visit last?
faq.a: A video conference visit generally lasts between 30 and 45 minutes, depending on your questions and needs.

faq.q: Do I have to pay for a visit?
faq.a: No, all our visits (virtual, video, and physical) are completely free and without obligation.

faq.hero_subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions about purchasing, delivery, and our services

purchase.title: Vehicle Purchase
purchase.q1: How can I buy a vehicle?
purchase.a1: You can browse our online catalog, select the vehicle you're interested in, and contact us to finalize the purchase. We guide you through every step of the process.
purchase.q2: Can I see the vehicle before buying it?
purchase.a2: Yes, we offer detailed virtual tours and you can also schedule a physical visit at our premises in Germany or at our sales points.
purchase.a3: We accept bank transfers, credit card payments, and also offer personalized financing solutions.
purchase.q4: Is it possible to take a test drive?
purchase.a4: Yes, you can take a test drive by appointment at our premises in Germany or at one of our partner sales points.

delivery.title: Delivery and Transport
delivery.q1: Which countries do you deliver to?
delivery.a1: We deliver throughout Europe: France, Belgium, Switzerland, Luxembourg, Italy, Spain, Portugal, Romania, and other countries upon request.
delivery.a2: The timeframe varies by country: 5-7 days for France, 4-6 days for Belgium, up to 10-12 days for more distant destinations.
delivery.a3: All our vehicles are transported by certified professionals and are fully insured during transport.
delivery.q4: Can I pick up the vehicle myself?
delivery.a4: Yes, you can collect your vehicle directly from our premises in Germany. We assist you with all necessary formalities.

warranties.title: Warranties and Services
warranties.q1: What warranty is included with the vehicle?
warranties.a1: All our vehicles include a minimum 12-month warranty. You can also subscribe to an extended 24-month warranty.
warranties.a2: The warranty covers major mechanical and electrical defects. The extended warranty offers comprehensive coverage including 24/7 assistance and a replacement vehicle.
warranties.a3: Yes, all our vehicles undergo a complete technical inspection and detailed expertise before sale. We provide a full report.
warranties.a4: Yes, we offer complete after-sales service with technical assistance, maintenance, and repairs in our partner network.

documentation.title: Documentation and Formalities
documentation.a1: You will receive: the registration certificate, technical inspection, service book, European certificate of conformity, and all documents necessary for registration.
documentation.a2: Yes, we assist you with all registration procedures in your country and provide all necessary documents.
documentation.q3: Is the vehicle compliant with European standards?
documentation.a3: Yes, all our vehicles comply with European standards and have an EC certificate of conformity.
documentation.a4: No, all our prices are transparent. The displayed price includes the vehicle and warranty. Delivery and registration fees are clearly indicated separately.

financing.title: Financing
financing.a1: Yes, we work with several financial partners to offer you credit solutions adapted to your situation.
financing.q2: What is the minimum down payment?
financing.a2: The minimum down payment varies according to your situation and the chosen vehicle. Contact us for a personalized study.
financing.q3: Can I get credit without a down payment?
financing.a3: Yes, under certain conditions. Our financial advisors will study your file to find the best solution.
financing.q4: What is the maximum financing duration?
financing.a4: We offer financing from 12 to 84 months depending on your profile and the amount borrowed.

faq.cta_subtitle: Our team is here to help you

commitments.hero_subtitle: Strong values that guide each of our daily actions
commitments.promise_text: At AUTO17, we don't just sell vehicles. We build relationships of trust based on solid values and concrete commitments. Every decision we make is guided by our desire to offer you the best possible experience.

transparency.title: Total Transparency
transparency.description: We believe in honest and transparent communication. Each vehicle comes with a complete report detailing its history, condition, and all relevant information.
points: Clear prices with no hidden fees

quality.title: Guaranteed Quality
quality.description: We only select premium quality vehicles. Each car goes through rigorous quality control before being offered for sale.

service.title: Exceptional Customer Service
service.description: Your satisfaction is our priority. Our dedicated team supports you at every step, from selection to delivery and beyond.

ecology.title: Environmental Commitment
ecology.description: We are committed to reducing our carbon footprint by optimizing our transport and offering a wide selection of electric and hybrid vehicles.

trust.title: Trust Relationship
trust.description: We build lasting relationships with our customers based on trust, integrity, and mutual respect.

innovation.title: Continuous Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly invest in new technologies to improve your purchasing experience and offer you the best services.

commitments.testimonials_subtitle: Discover testimonials from our satisfied customers

testimonials.text: Exceptional service! The team supported me from start to finish. My Audi arrived in perfect condition.
Total transparency on the vehicle's condition. No surprises, pure happiness!
Simple and fast process. I highly recommend AUTO17 to all my friends.

commitments.cta_subtitle: Experience a different automotive service, based on trust and excellence

sales_points.hero_subtitle: Present throughout Europe to serve you better
sales_points.intro_title: A European Network at Your Service
sales_points.intro_text: Our network of sales and delivery points extends across Europe to offer you local service. Whether you want to pick up your vehicle directly or benefit from home delivery, we have the solution tailored to your needs.

advisor.title: Dedicated Advisor
advisor.description: An expert listening to answer your questions

sales_points.cta_subtitle: Make an appointment at the sales point closest to you
